verdict.summary: CodeBuild project failed during one of the build phases due to command errors, permissions, or environment issues.

dead_ends.action: Retry the build without checking logs
dead_ends.why_fails: If the failure is deterministic (bad buildspec, missing deps), retries will fail identically

dead_ends.action: Switch to a different compute type to fix build errors
dead_ends.why_fails: Compute type changes only fix resource exhaustion, not command or permission errors

workarounds.action: Check CloudWatch logs for the specific phase and command that failed
Verify CodeBuild service role has required permissions for all AWS services used
workarounds.how: Check IAM role attached to the CodeBuild project has access to S3, ECR, Secrets Manager, etc.

leads_to.condition: CodeBuild failure causes pipeline stage to fail

preceded_by.condition: IAM permission issues during build commands

frequently_confused_with.distinction: CodeBuild failure is about the build itself; CodePipeline failure is about the orchestration stage that wraps it
